subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Terrelle Pryor worked out for 17 N.F.L. team interested in taking him in Monday’s supplemental draft, but he won’t be able to play the first five games once he signs.
snippet: Terrelle Pryor worked out for 17 N.F.L. team interested in taking him in Monday’s supplemental draft, but he won’t be able to play the first five games once he signs.
